intro: Hey dude! I'm a bot who can give you free, custom roles. Just give me a role to give you and you'll get it, free of all charge! To add a role, say '#add (your role here)'. If you wanna remove a role, just say '#remove (your role here)'. If you wanna invite me to your server, just say #invite. If you want a full list of roles in your server, just say #roles. Have fu, dude!
